raf_autenticated.popupfootercontent: The is a post-only message from Grand Rapids Energy. Please do not attempt to reply to this message. We would love to hear from you if you have questions. For assistance with your account. Please contact us via phone, e-mail customerservice@gre.com
raf_autenticated.rafemailbody: Enrolling is easy. Either click the button below to enroll online, or give GRE a call at 1.877.850.6200 and provide the Referral Code and Promotion Code below. Your gas service won't be interrupted when you switch. Grand Rapids Energy experts will handle all the details for you.
raf_autenticated.rafemailsubject: Enroll with Grand Rapids Energy and we could both get $25
raf_autenticated.rafterms: Subject to the Refer-a-Friend program ("RAF Program") rules and terms and conditions (at onlyong.com/refer). Offer limited to: (i) qualified new residential/commercial customers (each a “Referee") who use a promotion code through this RAF Program to enroll in an eligible ONG price plan (each a “RAF Referee"), and (ii) existing customers who refer one or more Referees using the RAF Program (each a “Referrer").
